description: Sum by active_state to count units
Whether the unit is currently in active state
Whether the unit is currently in loaded state
The unit uptime since it's active
The overall cpu consumed by the service in nano seconds (CPUUsageNSec)
The memory currently used by the service in bytes (MemoryCurrent)
The current number of tasks in the service (TasksCurrent)
The number of time the service has been restarted due to `Restart=` (NRestarts), requires at least systemd version 235
The number of accepted socket connections (NAccepted)
The current number of socket connections (NConnections)
The total number of refused socket connections (NRefused), requires at least systemd version 235
